title: cant log in have verified username and reset password
body: dont know whats going on but i downloaded kill my ping now i cant log in at all.

replies.body: Oh boy.  It sounds like it literally killed your ping then, and can't connect at all.  We don't support any third parties and I'm unfamiliar with that one, so I'd recommend uninstalling that for now.  In the meantime, double check your patcher as well to verify that you're on the NA region, and let me know if that was the case.
